fields.name: ActionHostName
fields.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. myapp-stage.azurewebsites.net.

fields.name: ChangeDecisionCallbackUrl
fields.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

fields.name: ChangeIntervalInMinutes
fields.description: Specifies interval in minutes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage.

fields.name: ChangeStep
fields.description: In auto ramp up scenario this is the step to add/remove from ReroutePercentage until it reaches \nMinReroutePercentage or MaxReroutePercentage. Site metrics are checked every N minutes specified in ChangeIntervalInMinutes.\nCustom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified in ChangeDecisionCallbackUrl.

fields.name: MaxReroutePercentage
fields.description: Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

fields.name: MinReroutePercentage
fields.description: Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

fields.name: ReroutePercentage
fields.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to ActionHostName.
